title: Chat connection is stupid
body: I have had to dodge at least 10-15 games now cause my chat doesnt connect. I cant tell what roles my teammates pick and dont know what to pick so i have to dodge. can someone tell me a fix for my chat not connecting

replies.body: Chat is pretty important, and it may be a good point to stick to customs to troubleshoot for now.  The client needs to access a variety of different services like chat, but can be blocked off.  See if [port forwarding c](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)an help fix things up in this case:
